Growing the HPC Community

As a leader in the HPC community, the ALCF is actively involved in efforts to broaden the impact of supercomputers and AI for science. The facility also leads and contributes to several activities designed to inspire the next generation of researchers in HPC and the computing sciences.

Powering breakthroughs for U.S. industry

Building the Computing Workforce of the Future

Shaping the Future of Supercomputing

Training ALCF Users

Inspiring Students

By updating and expanding its testbed for AI accelerators, the ALCF enables users to harness leading-edge AI technologies for efficient and impactful scientific discovery.
